data.metadata:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<EntityDescriptor entityID="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/metadata.php" xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:metadata">
    <Extensions>
        <ns1:EntityAttributes xmlns:ns1="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:metadata:attribute">
            <ns2:Attribute Name="http://macedir.org/entity-category-support" NameFormat="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:uri" xmlns:ns2="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:assertion">
                <ns2:AttributeValue>http://refeds.org/category/research-and-scholarship</ns2:AttributeValue>
            </ns2:Attribute>
        </ns1:EntityAttributes>
    </Extensions>
    <IDPSSODescriptor protocolSupportEnumeration="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:protocol">
        <KeyDescriptor use="signing">
            <ds:KeyInfo xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#">
                <ds:X509Data>
                    <ds:X509Certificate></ds:X509Certificate>
                </ds:X509Data>
      </ds:KeyInfo>
        </KeyDescriptor>
        <KeyDescriptor use="encryption">
            <ds:KeyInfo xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#">
                <ds:X509Data>
                    <ds:X509Certificate></ds:X509Certificate>
                </ds:X509Data>
      </ds:KeyInfo>
        </KeyDescriptor>
        <SingleLogoutService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect" Location="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/SingleLogoutService.php"/>
        <SingleLogoutService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST" Location="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/SingleLogoutService.php"/>
        <NameIDFormat>urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient</NameIDFormat>
        <SingleSignOnService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect" Location="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/SSOService.php"/>
        <SingleSignOnService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST" Location="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/SSOService.php"/>
    </IDPSSODescriptor>
    <Organization>
        <OrganizationName xml:lang="en">Amido</OrganizationName>
        <OrganizationDisplayName xml:lang="en">Amido</OrganizationDisplayName>
        <OrganizationURL xml:lang="en">http://amido.com</OrganizationURL>
    </Organization>
    <ContactPerson contactType="technical">
        <GivenName>Efthimis</GivenName>
        <SurName>Efthimis</SurName>
        <EmailAddress>mailto:Efthimis.Efthimis@amido.com</EmailAddress>
    </ContactPerson>
</EntityDescriptor>
data.entityConfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<EntityConfig entityID="https://hmctstestsaml.samlidp.io/saml2/idp/metadata.php" hosted="false" xmlns="urn:sun:fm:SAML:2.0:entityconfig">
    <IDPSSOConfig>
        <Attribute name="cotlist">
            <Value>reform_verify</Value>
        </Attribute>
    </IDPSSOConfig>
</EntityConfig>
